headline.main: Pet Products to Ease a Dog's Life; Pet Products Aim to Ease Strain of a Dog's Life

docs.lead_paragraph: A basset hound named Sophia, a Pekingese called Dukie and a marmoset responding to Charlie Brown showed up yesterday morning at the Americana Hotel for a sneak preview of what mankind has in store for them.
docs.snippet: A basset hound named Sophia, a Pekingese called Dukie and a marmoset responding to Charlie Brown showed up yesterday morning at the Americana Hotel for a sneak preview of what mankind has in store for them.

byline.original: By HAROLD M. SOHMECK Jr. Special to The New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 16 Disease of the heart and circulatory system kills more Americans than does any other disease. It is often called the nation's number one health problem.
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 16 Disease of the heart and circulatory system kills more Americans than does any other disease. It is often called the nation's number one health problem.

headline.main: News Summary and Index; The Major Events of the Day International National Metropolitan
Obesity Called a Rising Health Hazard; OBESITY CALLED HEALTH PROBEM

docs.abstract: PHS repts obesity major pub health problem; sees problem worsening as Amers eat more and exercise less; suggests more exercise and less eating
docs.lead_paragraph: Obesity among Americans is a major public health problem that is bound to get worse as the nation eats more and exercises less, a panel of experts concludes. They reach this conclusion in a report soon to be published by the United States Public Health Service.
